description:
As a player
  I want to follow standard Chinese Chess rules
  So that I can play the game correctly

  We use (row, col) to indicate positions on a 9×10 board.
  Row 1 is Red’s bottom row; Row 10 is Black’s top row.
  Column 1 is the leftmost column from Red’s perspective.
  
  Each scenario sets up minimal conditions with relevant pieces.

elements.name: Red moves the General within the palace (Legal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red General at (1, 5)
Red moves the General from (1, 5) to (1, 4)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the General outside the palace (Illegal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red General at (1, 6)
Red moves the General from (1, 6) to (1, 7)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Generals face each other on the same file (Illegal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the General from (2, 4) to (2, 5)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Guard diagonally in the palace (Legal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Guard at (1, 4)
Red moves the Guard from (1, 4) to (2, 5)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the Guard straight (Illegal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Guard at (2, 5)
Red moves the Guard from (2, 5) to (2, 6)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Rook along a clear rank (Legal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Rook at (4, 1)
Red moves the Rook from (4, 1) to (4, 9)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the Rook and attempts to jump over a piece (Illegal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the Rook from (4, 1) to (4, 9)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Horse in an “L” shape with no block (Legal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Horse at (3, 3)
Red moves the Horse from (3, 3) to (5, 4)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the Horse and it is blocked by an adjacent piece (Illegal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the Horse from (3, 3) to (5, 4)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Cannon like a Rook with an empty path (Legal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Cannon at (6, 2)
Red moves the Cannon from (6, 2) to (6, 8)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the Cannon and jumps exactly one screen to capture (Legal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the Cannon from (6, 2) to (6, 8)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the Cannon and tries to jump with zero screens (Illegal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the Cannon from (6, 2) to (6, 8)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Cannon and tries to jump with more than one screen (Illegal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the Cannon from (6, 2) to (6, 8)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Elephant 2-step diagonal with a clear midpoint (Legal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Elephant at (3, 3)
Red moves the Elephant from (3, 3) to (5, 5)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the Elephant and tries to cross the river (Illegal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Elephant at (5, 3)
Red moves the Elephant from (5, 3) to (7, 5)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Elephant and its midpoint is blocked (Illegal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the Elephant from (3, 3) to (5, 5)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Soldier forward before crossing the river (Legal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Soldier at (3, 5)
Red moves the Soldier from (3, 5) to (4, 5)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the Soldier and tries to move sideways before crossing (Illegal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Soldier at (3, 5)
Red moves the Soldier from (3, 5) to (3, 4)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red moves the Soldier sideways after crossing the river (Legal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Soldier at (6, 5)
Red moves the Soldier from (6, 5) to (6, 4)
the move is legal

elements.name: Red moves the Soldier and attempts to move backward after crossing (Illegal)

steps.name: the board is empty except for a Red Soldier at (6, 5)
Red moves the Soldier from (6, 5) to (5, 5)
the move is illegal

elements.name: Red captures opponent's General and wins immediately (Legal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the Rook from (5, 5) to (5, 8)
Red wins immediately

elements.name: Red captures a non-General piece and the game continues (Legal)

steps.name: the board has:
Red moves the Rook from (5, 5) to (5, 8)
the game is not over just from that capture

name: Chinese Chess (象棋) Rules

description: 當啟動雙十一優惠活動時，訂單可享有同一種商品每 10 件 20% 折扣的優惠。

elements.id: 雙十一優惠活動;購買-12-件同一種商品
elements.name: 購買 12 件同一種商品

steps.name: 雙十一優惠活動已啟動
訂單中有 12 件價格為 100 元的襪子
計算訂單總價
訂單總價應為 1000

elements.id: 雙十一優惠活動;購買-27-件同一種商品
elements.name: 購買 27 件同一種商品

steps.name: 雙十一優惠活動已啟動
訂單中有 27 件價格為 100 元的襪子
計算訂單總價
訂單總價應為 2300

elements.id: 雙十一優惠活動;購買-10-種不同商品各一件
elements.name: 購買 10 種不同商品各一件

steps.name: 雙十一優惠活動已啟動
訂單中有商品 A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J 各 1 件，且每件價格皆為 100 元
計算訂單總價
訂單總價應為 1000

name: 雙十一優惠活動
